## About me: 
My name is Rita Liu. I'm from Beijing, China. My favorite activity during free time is to eat snacks while watching sitcoms. 

## Education: 
I go to Macalester College in Saint Paul, Minnesota. I double major in Applied Math and Economics. Here are some classes I'vev taken: Mathematical Modeling (Python), Computational Linear Algebra (R), Differential Equation(Matlab), Machine Learning, Probability, Survival Analysis, Finance, Econometrics, Data Science (R), Data Structure.
